summary: This mod adds five new female followers in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=yellow]Not supporting this mod any longer. Use at your own risk.[/color][/size]

[color=yellow]
Notice: Read mod description before you ask anything. If your question is already answered in the mod description, I will ignore it. Also, please do not request anything. I\'m open to suggestion of new followers though (ex. dark elf conjurer would be nice for next follower).  

If eyebrows are not showing up correctly, set texture quality in to high in the game launcher OR open eyebrows textures and re-save them via Photoshop/GIMP.

Updates:

V1.7 - Textures updated and compressed. This should minimize lagging and CTD issues as well as neck seam.

Added Optional file - Presets based on each followers + one additional Nord preset from my other mod, Serena Facelift (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23417). 
Please read the READ ME in the file for required files list. 
This optional file will replace 6, 7, 8th Nord female presets and 8th female presets of Breton, Imperial and Redguard. 

[/color]


This mod adds five female followers.
You can find them in [b]The Bannered Mare in Whiterun[/b].

[color=red]All required mods are included in the main file, you don\'t need any additional mods to be installed.[/color]

FYI : I welcome bug report and I\'ll try to support the mod as much as possible. However, I will not take any feedback upon follower\'s appearance such as body type and any colors.  

[youtube]K_-JyXjPwz8[/youtube] [youtube]EqU39Y-syb8[/youtube]
[youtube]v1kOmuYJOVQ[/youtube] [youtube]QbW6IuhXk9c[/youtube]


[color=red][size=15][b]Information[/b][/size][/color]

[b]Chastity[/b]
- Nord Vampire Base (However her race is human nord)
- Specialized in One-handed, Light Armor, Magic, Sneak
- Min level @ 10, Max level @ 100
- Body : UNP
- Chastity does not have freckles in this follower mod. Check the screenshot of clean face.

[b]Eris[/b]
- Nord S&S Warrior
- Specialized in One-handed, Heavy Armor, Block
- Min level @ 10, Max level @ 100
- Body : UNP

[b]Kodelia[/b]
- Breton Mage
- Specialized in Magic(except Illusion), Light Armor, Sneak
- Min level @ 10, Max level @ 100
- Body : UNP

[b]Lucretia[/b]
- Imperial Warrior 2H (Battleaxe)
- Specialized in Two-handed, Block, Heavy Armor
- Min level @ 10, Max level @ 100
- Body : UNP

[b]Sabeena[/b]
- Redguard Scout/Archer
- Specialized in Archery, Light Armor, Sneak
- Min level @ 10, Max level @ 100
- Body : UNP


[color=red][size=15][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It\'s generally C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\
Make sure to activate SGFChastity.esp and SGFEris.esp in Data files in the game launcher.


[color=red][size=15][b]Uninstallation[/b][/size][/color]

Delete these files:
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\SGFollower
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\SGFChastity.esp\\
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\SGFEris.esp\\
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\SGFKodelia.esp\\
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\SGFLucretia.esp\\
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\SGFSabeena.esp\\
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\SGFollower
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\SGFChastity.esp\\
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\SGFEris.esp\\
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\SGFKodelia.esp\\
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\SGFLucretia.esp\\
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\SGFSabeena.esp\\
Data\\SGFChastitiy.esp
Data\\SGFEris.esp
Data\\SGFKodelia.esp
Data\\SGFLucretia.esp
Data\\SGFSabeena.esp



[color=red][size=15][b] Frequently Asked Questions[/b][/size][/color]

Q. Could you make all-in-one esp? 
A. Sorry, but I\'m not going to make all-in-one esp for you. My CK is kinda choosy when it comes to cell editing. It CTDs whenever I choose to load certain cells and Riverwood and Whiterun are included in those cells. I had to use NPC editor to place them in the Bannered Mare. As far as I know there are limitations in NPC editor regarding positioning of NPCs and such. So I won\'t be able to make all-in-one esp.

Q. Are they marriageable?
A. Yes.

Q. Are you going to make extra contents such as follower quests and unique voices?
A. No, I simply don\'t have enough resources and time.

Q. Do/change blahblahblah for me, please.
A. NO! DON\'T EVER REQUEST ANYTHING. However, I do take suggestions for new followers.

Q. I get CTDs whenever I try to enter the Bannered Mare.
A. Avoid going in to the Bannered Mare at evening/night time. Go to the Bannered Mare when it\'s not so busy.

Q. Skin and body of followers are all black!
A. Your computer sucks, it can\'t take high quality texture mod. Uninstall this mod now.

Q. Followers\' appearances doesn\'t look like your screen shots.
A. Try manual installing rather than NMM. NMM can cause some file structuring errors.



[color=red][size=15][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554)
Enhanced Character Edit by tktk (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951)
Girls of Skyrim by basskimm (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038)
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168)
Improved Eyes Skyrim by missjennabee (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249)
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722)
65 Standalone Additional Warpaints by Regn by Regn (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21693)
HQ Eyebrows - vanilla texture replacers by Regn (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21451)
numenume femalebrows MARO by numenume (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7625)
author: Hello Santa
